alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 10:46PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Channel Lake, or over Fox Lake, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gurnee, Round Lake Beach, Grayslake, Round Lake, Antioch, Fox Lake, Lake Villa, Lindenhurst, Gages Lake, Round Lake Park, Grandwood Park, Long Lake, Pistakee Highlands, Volo, Venetian Village, Channel Lake, Lake Catherine, Third Lake, Hainesville and Round Lake Heights. This includes... Chain O Lakes State Park and College of Lake County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
